_sText:
<iframe width="560" height="345" src="http://www.youtube.com/embed/heOq3INNY44" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>

The Surf_Water-Run Banjo Map Pack!

Thanks for taking a look at my Map Pack, here are the three maps contained in the download:

surf_water-run_banjo: The classic water-run map. Spawn with scouts, die when you fall, etc.

surf_water-run_banjo_jail: Self Explanitory. Perfect for DM or RPG Servers.

surf_water-run_banjo_skill: Spawn with no weapons, two extra stages added into the mix.

Stage 1: Secret Kool Aid Stage (Located in both surf_water-run_banjo & surf_water-run_banjo_jail)

Stage 2: Water-Run Level #1

Stage 3: Water-Run Level #2

Stage 4: Water-Run Level #3

Stage 5: Bonus stage I made. Its tough!

Secret Kool Aid Area INFO:

Theres a picture of me wearing a Kool Aid T-Shirt on Level 2 of surf_water-run_banjo and surf_water-run_banjo_jail. To access the secret Kool Aid Level you must press two buttons with the kool aid face that are located before my picture on Level 2. After pressing the second button, you have 12 seconds to reach my picture before the glass reappears.
